title: Using EIP712 for Off-Chain Permit and Whitelist Design
creator: 0xD6823f807C45eFDC56c9aE8Db0226CA10af6E8AB

questions.title:
1. Write your own ERC20 contract using the EIP2612 standard (based on the OpenZeppelin library).
2. Modify the [TokenBank deposit contract](https://decert.me/challenge/eeb9f7d8-6fd0-4c38-b09c-75a29bd53af3) to support off-chain signature authorization (permit) for deposits.
3. Modify [Token purchase NFT](https://decert.me/challenge/5f11aa15-b101-480b-91b5-4888b9aafdbb) so that only whitelisted addresses with off-chain authorization can purchase NFTs.

description: Understand the EIP712 standard and try to master the off-chain signature method for token authorization and whitelist design.
